Date: 2025-01-21 11:02
Subject: Winter Skin Challenge : Adapting Your Skincare For The Season
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Valued Partners,

With winter in full swing, the colder weather can significantly impact your skin. This season presents its own challenges, but practical tips can help you maintain a healthy skincare routine and keep your skin nourished and hydrated.

We’re excited to share this month's newsletter, focusing on the Winter Skin Challenge: Adapting Your Skincare for the Season. This guide offers effective tips to help you maintain your skin's health and hydration throughout winter.

Happy reading.

Warm Regards, 


 <https://nascoconnect.com/resources/images/memberPortal/Icon_Colored_Logo.png> 

Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291
